original_text:
And to Adam he said,
“Because you have listened to the voice of your wife
    and have eaten of the tree
of which I commanded you,
    ‘You shall not eat of it,’
cursed is the ground because of you;
    in pain you shall eat of it all the days of your life;
korean_text: 아담에게 이르시되 네가 네 아내의 말을 듣고 내가 네게 먹지 말라 한 나무의 열매를 먹었은즉 땅은 너로 말미암아 저주를 받고 너는 네 평생에 수고하여야 그 소산을 먹으리라

sentences.original_text: Because you have listened to the voice of your wife
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 네 아내의 목소리를 들었기 때문에

sentences.original_text: and have eaten of the tree
cursed is the ground because of you;
in pain you shall eat of it
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 고통 속에서 그것을 먹을 것이며

sentences.original_text: all the days of your life;
